entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Elk Island (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:09 a.m. MDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 16.0Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Elk Island National Park 10:00 AM MDT Thursday 11 May 2023
Temperature: 16.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 59 %
Dewpoint: 7.9°C
Wind: E 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 22. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of showers this afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. High 22. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:09 AM MDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening with risk of a thunderstorm. Fog patches developing overnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 5:09 AM MDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High 24. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:09 AM MDT Thursday 11 May 2023
